verbs.description: [V: suspected] gang member wanted in connection with string of montebello robberies police are seeking the public help in finding an alleged east los angeles gang member suspected of using a skeleton mask to conceal his identity during a string of recent armed robberies in montebello montebello police on wednesday identified the suspect as daniel joseph macias 22 who they say is a member of the lott street gang authorities say macias is responsible for at least four armed robberies in the city each of which had daniel joseph macias san bernardino county san bernardino county california montebello california suv gang los angeles montebello
